title: BRIEF-Phoenix Petroleum Philippines Says Unit Signed Partnership With Hengyi Industries International
text:
BRIEF-Phoenix Petroleum Philippines Says Unit Signed Partnership With Hengyi Industries International

Stock Markets 34 minutes ago (Sep 13, 2019 08:40)

BRIEF-Phoenix Petroleum Philippines Says Unit Signed Partnership With Hengyi Industries International Sept 13 (Reuters) - Phoenix Petroleum Philippines Inc

:

* UNIT SIGNED PARTNERSHIP WITH HENGYI INDUSTRIES

INTERNATIONAL

PTE. LTD. FOR LPG OFFTAKE VENTURE IN BRUNEI



Source text for Eikon: ID:nPSX5vPBNz

Further company coverage: PNX.PS
